price: ߥߟߊ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߫ ߣߌ߬ߣߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߛߐߟߌߟߊ ߟߊ߫ ߤߌߣߊ ߡߣߐ߬ߓߏ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
